attributes.action: Give Capt Thomas Moore a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: Such a monumental achievement at that age should be recognised and would be fitting a man who turns 100 years old at the end of April. In such hard times, he is a shining example of Britain and what it can do in such times and inspire a new generation to help others
attributes.background: So far, Capt Thomas Moore at the age of 99 years old has raised over £8 million and rising for the NHS prior to his 100th birthday.

rejection.details:
In any case we can't publish petitions calling for people to receive an honour. You can find out more about the honours process and how to nominate someone at

www.gov.uk/honours
